Description.Text: Αll rooms are in traditional style and beautifully decorated with earthy colors. Include living room, dining room, spacious room and comfortable twin or double beds with mattress anatoniko. Room Facilities: -Single / Twin -Suites -Fireplace -Mini Bar / Refrigerator -Kitchenette -Heating -Hair-dryer -Phone -Television -Private bathroom with shower -Room Service Hotel Facilities: Hotel offers the possibility to organize weddings, events, meetings like space (internal and external) for art exhibitions (painting, sculpture, photography). Currently at our site there is an exhibition of works by Anthony Τavani. On site there is wireless Internet access is provided and can send / receive faxes.The breakfast room is unique and rich buffet has traditional Greek dishes for all tastes.
Hotel Aglaida is located 3km from the village of Tagarada and 2,5 km from Fakistra beach.
